A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: No Spoilers: While some might not like this fresh new direction for Star Wars\, this is the one that finally sets us on a path for the future instead of living in the past. \"Let the past die\" was clearly the battlecry of this film and we are all the better for it. Ignore the haters\, in time they will come to see the truth. It is a shocking film\, very different from what I expected\, but in all the right ways.
